articles.description: A look at some of the most telling statistics from the Detroit Lions’ Week 1 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles.
articles.content: By day, I live a life very much removed from Pride of Detroit. For those who listen or watch our Twitch channel, my day job is teaching high school here in Michigan. Its often my night job, too, but … [+4881 chars]
